inputs.name: selectedOption
inputs.label: Testcase Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of the test to execute.

inputs.name: productpath
inputs.label: Product Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The fully qualified path to the HCL OneTest UI application. Use '\\' or '/' as the file separator. This path must exist on the agent.

inputs.name: projectdir
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The fully qualified path to HCL OneTest UI project directory. Use '\\' or '/' as the file separator. This path must exist on the agent.

inputs.name: testsuite
inputs.label: Test Suite Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the script to be executed without the extension. For eg., Script1 or TestFolder.Script1 in case Script1 is in a folder named TestFolder.

inputs.name: logformat
inputs.label: Log Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: The format of the script logs.

inputs.name: itercount
inputs.label: Iteration Count
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of Dataset iterations to be run.

inputs.name: imshared
inputs.label: IMShared Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the IMShared folder in your local installation. This is where plugins and product dependencies will be located by the execution agent.

inputs.name: workspace
inputs.label: Workspace Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the project workspace on the agent disk.

inputs.name: project
inputs.label: Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of a project within the workspace to use.

inputs.name: suite
inputs.label: Test Suite Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of a test within the project to use. A test can be WebUI test, Compound test, Performance schedule or Accelerated Functional Test (AFT) suite.

inputs.name: varfile
inputs.label: Var File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The complete path to the XML file that contains the variable name and value pairs.

inputs.name: swapdatasets
inputs.label: Dataset Override
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use this option to replace dataset values during a test or schedule run. You must ensure that both original and new datasets are in the same workspace and have the same column names. You must also include the path to the dataset. For example, /project_name/ds_path/ds_filename.csv:/project_name/ds_path/new_ds_filename.csv
